plot: Two young ladies are competing in a canoe race and the more experienced girl always wins. But with the help of coaches the weaker girl makes spectacular progress and wins the competition.
title: Sopernitsy
plot_es: Two young ladies are competing in a canoe race and the more experienced girl always wins. But with the help of coaches the weaker girl makes spectacular progress and wins the competition.
plot_en: Two young ladies are competing in a canoe race and the more experienced girl always wins. But with the help of coaches the weaker girl makes spectacular progress and wins the competition.
